column1: #Text=Wan says : " Great lion turtle , I ask that you grant me the power of air so that I can defeat Vaatu before it 's too late . "
#Text=Air lion turtle says : " You already carry the power of fire .
#Text=" Air lion turtle says : " Hmm , perhaps .
#Text=But to do so , Raava must hold the power for you until you master it .
#Text=" Raava says : " Ancient one , why would I do that for a human ?
#Text=Especially one who 's caused so much trouble ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Raava , please , I ca n't let the world fall into chaos because of my mistake .
#Text=Neither of us can defeat Vaatu alone , but together we have a chance .
#Text=" Raava says : " You may be right .
#Text=I will help you to master the power of air .
#Text=And in return I will help you restore balance to the world .
